definition: with a side or oblique glance, directed to one side with, or as if with doubt, suspicion, or envy, used especially of glances
details:
adverb
- with a side or oblique glance
= example: with a side or oblique glance
- with suspicion or disapproval
= example: with suspicion or disapproval
adjective
- directed to one side with, or as if with doubt, suspicion, or envy, used especially of glances
= example: directed to one side with, or as if with doubt, suspicion, or envy, used especially of glances
= synonyms: askant, asquint, squint-eyed, squinty, squint, sidelong
